title: Morris on advancement - role of churches

content.question: Which of the following claims about the development of Black churches is most accurate?

choices.label: African American participation in Christian religious services was not widespread until after the Civil War.
African American churches focused solely on religious instruction within their communities.
The end of Reconstruction and the rise of Jim Crow significantly slowed the growth of Black churches.
African Americans continued to use churches to resist oppression and to build community.

content.answer: African Americans continued to use churches to resist oppression and to build community.
